sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-switch
        label="Toggle between light and dark theme."
        v-model="darkMode"
        @change="changeTheme"
      >
      </v-switch>
      {{ darkMode }}
      {{ kole }}
    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";

export default {
  name: "SettingsView",
  data() {
    return {
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: localTheme ? true : false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    changeTheme() {
      localStorage.setItem("theme", this.darkMode);
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkMode" : "lightMode";
    },
  },
  mounted() {},
  computed: {
    localTheme() {
      return localStorage.getItem("theme");
    },
  },
};
</script>
